name: Ignition SEO
overview:
Established in 2007, Ignition SEO has many years of experience in the digital marketing sector. The company provides a wide-range of digital marketing services to a diverse range of clients throughout the world. The agency is ideally situated in Manchester city centre which provides easy access to both national and international clients.

With an ever expanding client base including several blue chip organisations and many well-known names, the agency has a vast experience of working with clients of all sizes. The company also showcases an extensive range of client case studies on its website to help demonstrate the services they offer and the results they have achieved for their clients.

As a member of various organisations including Manchester Digital, UK Web Design Association, Econsultancy Digital Marketers United and most notably, the Recommended Agency Register; the company is at the very forefront of digital marketing.

With a team of highly experienced employees, Ignition SEO has a professional team sufficiently skilled in creating successful digital marketing campaigns designed to deliver great results.
